com.datastax.dse.driver.api.core.metadata.schema

Interface DseAggregateMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AggregateMetadata, Describable

    public interface DseAggregateMetadata
extends AggregateMetadata
    Specialized aggregate metadata for DSE.

    It adds support for the DSE-specific DETERMINISTIC keyword.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isDeterministic

        @Deprecated
boolean isDeterministic()
        Deprecated. Use getDeterministic() instead.

      • getDeterministic

        default Optional<Boolean> getDeterministic()
        Indicates if this aggregate is deterministic. A deterministic aggregate means that given a particular input, the aggregate will always produce the same output.

        This method returns empty if this information was not found in the system tables, regardless of the actual aggregate characteristics; this is the case for all versions of DSE older than 6.0.0.

        Returns:
        Whether or not this aggregate is deterministic; or empty if such information is not available in the system tables.

      • describe

        @NonNull
default String describe(boolean pretty)
        Description copied from interface: Describable
        Returns a single CQL statement that creates the element.
        Specified by:
        describe in interface AggregateMetadata
        Specified by:
        describe in interface Describable
        Parameters:
        pretty - if true, make the output more human-readable (line breaks, indents, and pretty identifiers). If false, return the statement on a single line with minimal formatting.
